scripts.say: Commander, I must thank you for giving me the chance to see the many interesting sights of this world.
However... I still want more. There's something I've always been after... Something that can fill the void in my heart...
The longer I go without it, the more things I must stuff inside the void to make do... But they aren't enough, not even close...
Commander, could you help me to finally fill this void forever? You're not going to just decline, are you?
